title: Base definitions
description: Contains definitions for data types shared by many schema files.

date.title: Date
date.description: an array consisting of year, month and date respectively; Only the year is required.

period.title: Period
period.description: a period of time between a start and end date; For active periods, the end date can be omitted.

start.description: the start date of the period

end.description: the end date of the period; If omitted, the period is considered active in the present.

coordinates.title: Coordinates
coordinates.description: a pair of two numbers that uniquely identify a point on the globe

latitude.description: a measure of distance North (positive) or South (negative) of the Equator (zero degrees)

longitude.description: a measure of distance East (positive) or West (negative) of the Prime Meridian (zero degrees)

address.title: Address
address.description: a physical location for an entity such as an organisation or educational institute

addressLines.description: the human-readable representation of the address in multiple lines of text

city.description: the name of the city, town or village

state.description: the name of the state or province

countryCode.description: the two letter country code as per ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

postBox.description: the Post Office box number that can be used to deposit mail

postCode.description: the code assigned to the location by the postal system, like a ZIP or PIN code
